# Lunary - Comprehensive Knowledge Base

> A calm AI companion for cosmic self understanding. Personalised astrology based on real astronomical data.

This document contains detailed reference content from Lunary's 500+ page digital grimoire. For the concise overview, see: https://lunary.app/llms.txt

---

## Zodiac Signs

### Aries (March 21 - April 19)
Element: Fire | Ruling Planet: Mars
Represents courage, enthusiasm, and initiative. Rules beginnings and ventures, often associated with leadership qualities. Aries energy is pioneering, competitive, and action-oriented.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac/aries

### Taurus (April 20 - May 20)
Element: Earth | Ruling Planet: Venus
Symbolizes reliability, practicality, and determination. Influences matters of finance, comfort, and physical pleasures. Taurus energy is grounded, sensual, and steadfast.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac/taurus

### Gemini (May 21 - June 20)
Element: Air | Ruling Planet: Mercury
Associated with communication, intellectual curiosity, and versatility. Represents dual nature and adaptability. Gemini energy is curious, social, and mentally agile.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac/gemini

### Cancer (June 21 - July 22)
Element: Water | Ruling Planet: Moon
Emphasizes emotion, nurturing, and intuition. Rules home and family, focuses on caring and protective traits. Cancer energy is nurturing, intuitive, and emotionally deep.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac/cancer

### Leo (July 23 - August 22)
Element: Fire | Ruling Planet: Sun
Governs self-confidence, creativity, and drama. Symbolizes leadership, pride, and theatrical traits. Leo energy is generous, warm-hearted, and expressive.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac/leo

### Virgo (August 23 - September 22)
Element: Earth | Ruling Planet: Mercury
Represents practicality, analytical abilities, and attention to detail. Associated with service, meticulousness, and modesty. Virgo energy is helpful, precise, and health-conscious.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac/virgo

### Libra (September 23 - October 22)
Element: Air | Ruling Planet: Venus
Rules balance, harmony, and partnerships. Focused on justice, diplomacy, and relationships. Libra energy seeks fairness, beauty, and meaningful connections.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac/libra

### Scorpio (October 23 - November 21)
Element: Water | Ruling Planet: Pluto/Mars
Symbolizes transformation, mystery, and intensity. Influences themes of sexuality, death, and rebirth. Scorpio energy is passionate, investigative, and deeply emotional.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac/scorpio

### Sagittarius (November 22 - December 21)
Element: Fire | Ruling Planet: Jupiter
Associated with exploration, freedom, and philosophy. Represents optimism, love for freedom, and adventurous spirit. Sagittarius energy is philosophical, honest, and expansive.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac/sagittarius

### Capricorn (December 22 - January 19)
Element: Earth | Ruling Planet: Saturn
Emphasizes discipline, structure, and ambition. Rules career, determination, and careful planning. Capricorn energy is responsible, traditional, and achievement-oriented.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac/capricorn

### Aquarius (January 20 - February 18)
Element: Air | Ruling Planet: Uranus/Saturn
Represents innovation, individuality, and humanitarianism. Focuses on unconventional thinking, community, and idealism. Aquarius energy is progressive, original, and humanitarian.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac/aquarius

### Pisces (February 19 - March 20)
Element: Water | Ruling Planet: Neptune/Jupiter
Symbolizes empathy, compassion, and intuition. Associated with mysticism, spirituality, and sensitivity. Pisces energy is imaginative, artistic, and spiritually attuned.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/zodiac/pisces

---

## Planetary Bodies

### Sun
Represents the self, individuality, and spirit. Symbolizes power, vitality, and the essence of being. In your birth chart, the Sun shows your core identity and life purpose.

### Moon
Controls emotions, moods, and the unconscious. Influences intuition, psychic abilities, and emotional well-being. Your Moon sign reveals your emotional nature and inner needs.

### Mercury
Governed by communication, intellect, and speed. Associated with travel, writing, speaking, and all forms of communication. Mercury retrograde affects technology and communication.

### Venus
Rules love, beauty, and finances. Influences personal charm, attractiveness, and personal relationships. Venus shows how you love and what you value.

### Mars
Associated with energy, passion, and war. Influences desire, aggression, and determination. Mars shows how you take action and express anger.

### Jupiter
Symbolizes growth, expansion, and abundance. Known for bringing luck and wealth. Jupiter shows where you find opportunity and meaning.

### Saturn
Represents discipline, responsibility, and restrictions. Teaches lessons about patience and diligence. Saturn shows where you face challenges and build mastery.

### Uranus
Associated with change, innovation, and disruption. Represents sudden shifts and revolutions. Uranus shows where you seek freedom and originality.

### Neptune
Rules dreams, imagination, and the subconscious. Linked to spirituality and intuition. Neptune shows where you seek transcendence and may experience confusion.

### Pluto
Represents transformation, power, and rebirth. Associated with deep psychological change and hidden forces. Pluto shows where you experience profound transformation.

---

## Moon Phases

### New Moon
Keywords: Beginnings, Intention, Renewal
The New Moon is a time of new beginnings, setting intentions, and starting fresh. Plant seeds for future growth. Focus on setting clear goals and starting new projects.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/moon/phases/new-moon

### Waxing Crescent
Keywords: Expansion, Courage, Action
A time for building momentum and taking action. Move forward with your plans and pursue goals with courage. Take practical steps toward your objectives.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/moon/phases/waxing-crescent

### First Quarter
Keywords: Challenges, Decisions, Growth
A time to face challenges and make decisions. Push through obstacles and continue growing. Focus on problem-solving and making necessary adjustments.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/moon/phases/first-quarter

### Waxing Gibbous
Keywords: Refinement, Patience, Preparation
A time for refinement and preparation. Review your progress, make improvements, and prepare for fruition. Fine-tune your plans and stay dedicated.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/moon/phases/waxing-gibbous

### Full Moon
Keywords: Completion, Clarity, Manifestation
A time of completion, clarity, and manifestation. Celebrate achievements and see results of your efforts. Focus on gratitude and releasing what no longer serves you.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/moon/phases/full-moon

### Waning Gibbous
Keywords: Gratitude, Sharing, Introspection
A time for gratitude, sharing, and introspection. Give thanks for accomplishments and share knowledge with others. Reflect on your journey and give back.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/moon/phases/waning-gibbous

### Last Quarter
Keywords: Release, Forgiveness, Transition
A time for release and forgiveness. Let go of what no longer serves you and prepare for new beginnings. Clear out the old and embrace transitions.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/moon/phases/last-quarter

### Waning Crescent
Keywords: Rest, Reflection, Closure
A time for rest, reflection, and closure. Wind down and prepare for the new cycle ahead. Focus on introspection and recharging your energy.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/moon/phases/waning-crescent

---

## Major Arcana Tarot Cards

### The Fool
Keywords: New beginnings, innocence, spontaneity, free spirit
Represents new beginnings, taking a leap of faith, and embracing the unknown. Encourages spontaneity and trust in the journey ahead.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-fool

### The Magician
Keywords: Manifestation, resourcefulness, power, inspired action
Signifies the ability to turn ideas into reality through focused intention. Symbolizes skill and the power to manifest desires.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-magician

### The High Priestess
Keywords: Intuition, sacred knowledge, divine feminine, subconscious
Embodies wisdom, intuition, and the deep mysteries of the subconscious. Encourages trusting your inner voice.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-high-priestess

### The Empress
Keywords: Femininity, beauty, nature, nurturing, abundance
Represents fertility, nurturing, and the beauty of nature. Signifies abundance and creativity.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-empress

### The Emperor
Keywords: Authority, establishment, structure, father figure
Stands for authority, structure, and control. Suggests discipline, order, and strategic planning.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-emperor

### The Hierophant
Keywords: Spiritual wisdom, tradition, conformity, institutions
Represents traditional values and spiritual wisdom. Encourages learning through established systems.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-hierophant

### The Lovers
Keywords: Love, harmony, relationships, choices
Symbolizes deep emotional connections and harmony. Highlights aligning values and making decisions that honor true feelings.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-lovers

### The Chariot
Keywords: Control, willpower, success, determination
Signifies triumph through determination and willpower. Encourages focused action and confidence.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-chariot

### Strength
Keywords: Courage, persuasion, influence, compassion
Embodies courage, compassion, and inner resilience. True strength lies in understanding and mastering emotions.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/strength

### The Hermit
Keywords: Soul-searching, introspection, solitude, inner guidance
Represents introspection and self-discovery. Encourages seeking solitude and inner guidance.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-hermit

### Wheel of Fortune
Keywords: Luck, karma, cycles, destiny, turning point
Signifies cycles of change and destiny. Reminds that what goes around comes around.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/wheel-of-fortune

### Justice
Keywords: Fairness, truth, cause and effect, law
Represents fairness, truth, and the law of cause and effect. Decisions have consequences.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/justice

### The Hanged Man
Keywords: Pause, surrender, letting go, new perspectives
Symbolizes suspension, sacrifice, and seeing things from a new perspective. Sometimes we must let go to move forward.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-hanged-man

### Death
Keywords: Endings, change, transformation, transition
Represents transformation and the end of a cycle. Not literal death, but profound change and rebirth.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/death

### Temperance
Keywords: Balance, moderation, patience, purpose
Symbolizes balance, patience, and moderation. Finding the middle ground and practicing self-control.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/temperance

### The Devil
Keywords: Shadow self, attachment, addiction, restriction
Represents bondage, addiction, and the shadow self. Reminds us to examine what chains us.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-devil

### The Tower
Keywords: Sudden change, upheaval, chaos, revelation
Signifies sudden upheaval and the destruction of false foundations. Chaos that leads to enlightenment.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-tower

### The Star
Keywords: Hope, faith, purpose, renewal, spirituality
Represents hope, inspiration, and serenity. A card of healing and renewed faith after difficulty.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-star

### The Moon
Keywords: Illusion, fear, anxiety, subconscious, intuition
Symbolizes illusion, fear, and the subconscious mind. Things may not be as they seem.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-moon

### The Sun
Keywords: Positivity, fun, warmth, success, vitality
Represents joy, success, and vitality. One of the most positive cards, bringing warmth and clarity.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-sun

### Judgement
Keywords: Judgement, rebirth, inner calling, absolution
Signifies reflection, reckoning, and answering a higher calling. Time for self-evaluation and awakening.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/judgement

### The World
Keywords: Completion, integration, accomplishment, travel
Represents completion, accomplishment, and wholeness. The end of a major life cycle.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/tarot/the-world

---

## Minor Arcana - Suit of Wands (Fire/Action)

### Ace of Wands
Keywords: Inspiration, new opportunities, growth, potential
A spark of creative inspiration. New beginnings in passion projects, career, or creative ventures.

### Two of Wands
Keywords: Future planning, progress, decisions, discovery
Planning for the future. You've started something and now must decide where to take it.

### Three of Wands
Keywords: Progress, expansion, foresight, overseas opportunities
Expansion and looking ahead. Your plans are taking shape and opportunities arise.

### Four of Wands
Keywords: Celebration, joy, harmony, relaxation, homecoming
Celebration and stability. A time to enjoy achievements and harmonious gatherings.

### Five of Wands
Keywords: Conflict, disagreements, competition, tension
Conflict and competition. Clashing egos and minor struggles that require resolution.

### Six of Wands
Keywords: Success, public recognition, progress, self-confidence
Victory and recognition. Your efforts are being acknowledged and celebrated.

### Seven of Wands
Keywords: Challenge, competition, protection, perseverance
Standing your ground. Defending your position against opposition and challenges.

### Eight of Wands
Keywords: Movement, fast paced change, action, alignment
Rapid movement and swift action. Things are accelerating quickly.

### Nine of Wands
Keywords: Resilience, courage, persistence, test of faith
Resilience and persistence. You're close to the finish but face one more challenge.

### Ten of Wands
Keywords: Burden, extra responsibility, hard work, completion
Burden and responsibility. Carrying too much weight. Time to delegate or release.

### Page of Wands
Keywords: Exploration, excitement, freedom, adventure
A messenger of inspiration. Enthusiasm for new adventures and creative exploration.

### Knight of Wands
Keywords: Energy, passion, adventure, impulsiveness
Action and adventure. Passionate pursuit of goals, sometimes impulsive.

### Queen of Wands
Keywords: Courage, confidence, independence, warmth
Confident and magnetic energy. Creative leadership with warmth and determination.

### King of Wands
Keywords: Natural-born leader, vision, entrepreneur, honour
Visionary leadership. Bold action, entrepreneurial spirit, and charismatic command.

---

## Minor Arcana - Suit of Cups (Water/Emotions)

### Ace of Cups
Keywords: Love, new feelings, emotional awakening, creativity
New emotional beginnings. Love, compassion, and creative inspiration flow.

### Two of Cups
Keywords: Partnership, unity, connection, love
Deep connection and partnership. Mutual attraction and balanced relationships.

### Three of Cups
Keywords: Celebration, friendship, creativity, community
Celebration and friendship. Joyful gatherings and creative collaborations.

### Four of Cups
Keywords: Meditation, contemplation, apathy, reevaluation
Contemplation and possibly discontent. Time to reassess what truly matters.

### Five of Cups
Keywords: Regret, failure, disappointment, pessimism
Loss and grief. Focusing on what's lost rather than what remains.

### Six of Cups
Keywords: Revisiting the past, childhood memories, innocence
Nostalgia and happy memories. Reconnecting with the past or inner child.

### Seven of Cups
Keywords: Opportunities, choices, wishful thinking, illusion
Many choices and fantasies. Beware of illusion versus reality.

### Eight of Cups
Keywords: Disappointment, abandonment, withdrawal, seeking truth
Walking away from something unfulfilling. Seeking deeper meaning elsewhere.

### Nine of Cups
Keywords: Contentment, satisfaction, gratitude, wish fulfilled
Emotional fulfillment. The "wish card" - contentment and gratitude.

### Ten of Cups
Keywords: Divine love, harmony, alignment, happy family
Ultimate emotional fulfillment. Harmony, love, and lasting happiness.

### Page of Cups
Keywords: Creative opportunities, curiosity, possibility
Emotional messenger. Intuitive insights and creative inspiration arriving.

### Knight of Cups
Keywords: Romance, charm, imagination, beauty
Romantic idealist. Following the heart with charm and creativity.

### Queen of Cups
Keywords: Compassion, calm, comfort, intuitive
Emotional intelligence and nurturing. Deep intuition and compassionate support.

### King of Cups
Keywords: Emotionally balanced, compassionate, diplomatic
Emotional mastery. Calm wisdom and balanced leadership through empathy.

---

## More Crystals

### Selenite
Properties: Cleansing, charging, clarity, connection to higher realms
Chakras: Crown, Third Eye
A powerful cleansing stone that can charge other crystals. Named after the moon goddess Selene.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/selenite

### Labradorite
Properties: Transformation, intuition, protection, magic
Chakras: Third Eye, Throat
The stone of magic and transformation. Protects the aura and enhances psychic abilities.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/labradorite

### Moonstone
Properties: Intuition, inner growth, strength, new beginnings
Chakras: Third Eye, Crown, Sacral
Connected to the moon's energy. Enhances intuition and supports emotional balance.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/moonstone

### Tiger's Eye
Properties: Courage, personal power, protection, good luck
Chakras: Solar Plexus, Sacral, Root
A stone of courage and motivation. Brings good luck and protection from negative energy.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/tigers-eye

### Obsidian
Properties: Protection, grounding, truth, shadow work
Chakras: Root
Volcanic glass that offers powerful protection and helps with shadow work and truth-seeking.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/obsidian

### Carnelian
Properties: Courage, vitality, sexuality, confidence, action
Chakras: Sacral, Root
A stone of motivation and endurance. Stimulates creativity and courage.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/carnelian

### Lapis Lazuli
Properties: Wisdom, truth, self-awareness, communication
Chakras: Throat, Third Eye
The stone of wisdom and truth. Enhances intellectual ability and stimulates desire for knowledge.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/lapis-lazuli

### Fluorite
Properties: Focus, clarity, protection, cleansing
Chakras: Heart, Throat, Third Eye
A highly protective and stabilizing stone. Excellent for mental clarity and decision-making.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/fluorite

### Malachite
Properties: Transformation, emotional healing, protection
Chakras: Heart, Solar Plexus
A powerful stone of transformation that absorbs negative energies and pollutants.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/malachite

### Aventurine
Properties: Prosperity, luck, confidence, heart healing
Chakras: Heart
Known as the stone of opportunity. Attracts luck and abundance while promoting compassion.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/aventurine

---

## Wheel of the Year (Sabbats)

### Samhain (October 31)
The Witch's New Year. The veil between worlds is thinnest. Honor ancestors, practice divination, and embrace transformation.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/wheel-of-the-year/samhain

### Yule (December 21)
Winter Solstice. The longest night, celebrating the return of the sun. Themes of rebirth, hope, and light in darkness.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/wheel-of-the-year/yule

### Imbolc (February 1-2)
The first stirrings of spring. Honoring Brigid, goddess of healing and creativity. Time for purification and new beginnings.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/wheel-of-the-year/imbolc

### Ostara (March 20-21)
Spring Equinox. Day and night are equal. Themes of fertility, balance, and new growth. The earth awakens.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/wheel-of-the-year/ostara

### Beltane (May 1)
The height of spring. Fire festival celebrating fertility, passion, and the union of the God and Goddess.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/wheel-of-the-year/beltane

### Litha (June 20-21)
Summer Solstice. The longest day. Celebrating the sun at its peak power. Abundance, growth, and fulfillment.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/wheel-of-the-year/litha

### Lughnasadh (August 1)
First harvest festival. Celebrating the grain harvest and the sacrificial god Lugh. Gratitude for abundance.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/wheel-of-the-year/lughnasadh

### Mabon (September 21-22)
Autumn Equinox. Second harvest. Balance of light and dark. Themes of thanksgiving, reflection, and preparation.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/wheel-of-the-year/mabon

---

## Angel Numbers

### 111 - Manifestation & New Beginnings
A powerful manifestation number signaling new beginnings and thought alignment with reality. Pay attention to your thoughts - they are manifesting rapidly.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/angel-numbers/111

### 222 - Balance & Harmony
A number of balance, harmony, and partnership. Trust the process. Everything is unfolding in divine timing.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/angel-numbers/222

### 333 - Divine Protection & Guidance
A sign that ascended masters and spiritual guides are with you. You are protected and supported on your path.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/angel-numbers/333

### 444 - Foundation & Stability
A sign that you are building a strong foundation. Your angels are supporting you in creating stability and security.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/angel-numbers/444

### 555 - Change & Transformation
Signals major changes and transformations ahead. Embrace the changes coming into your life.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/angel-numbers/555

### 666 - Balance & Material World
Represents balance between material and spiritual worlds. Find harmony and avoid becoming too materialistic.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/angel-numbers/666

### 777 - Spiritual Awakening
A highly spiritual number indicating you are on the right path. Spiritual awakening and enlightenment are unfolding.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/angel-numbers/777

### 888 - Abundance & Prosperity
A sign of abundance, prosperity, and financial blessings. The universe is rewarding your efforts.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/angel-numbers/888

### 999 - Completion & Endings
Signals the completion of a cycle. Something in your life is ending to make way for new beginnings.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/angel-numbers/999

---

## Chakras

### Root Chakra (Muladhara)
Location: Base of spine | Color: Red
Properties: Grounding, stability, physical energy, survival
Connects individuals to their physical world, enhances feeling of security and safety.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/chakras/root

### Sacral Chakra (Svadhisthana)
Location: Below the navel | Color: Orange
Properties: Creativity, sexuality, pleasure, emotional body
Fosters personal creativity and joy, helps in managing life's changes and emotional fluctuations.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/chakras/sacral

### Solar Plexus Chakra (Manipura)
Location: Stomach area | Color: Yellow
Properties: Self-esteem, willpower, self-discipline
Increases confidence and the ability to assert personal power in a balanced manner.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/chakras/solar-plexus

### Heart Chakra (Anahata)
Location: Center of chest | Color: Green
Properties: Love, healing, inner peace
Enhances the capacity to love others and oneself, brings healing and peace.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/chakras/heart

### Throat Chakra (Vishuddha)
Location: Throat | Color: Blue
Properties: Communication, expression, truth
Facilitates honest and clear communication from the heart.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/chakras/throat

### Third Eye Chakra (Ajna)
Location: Forehead, between eyes | Color: Indigo
Properties: Intuition, insight, mental ability
Promotes intuition and the ability to sense beyond the tangible world.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/chakras/third-eye

### Crown Chakra (Sahasrara)
Location: Top of head | Color: Violet
Properties: Spirituality, enlightenment, consciousness
Connects individual with the universe, fostering spiritual openness and enlightenment.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/chakras/crown

---

## Elder Futhark Runes

### Fehu ᚠ (Cattle)
Magical Properties: Wealth, prosperity, financial strength
Used in spells for wealth, abundance, and success. Represents mobile power and new beginnings.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/runes/fehu

### Uruz ᚢ (Aurochs)
Magical Properties: Strength, raw energy, vitality
Empowers rituals for health and vitality, signifies overcoming challenges through strength.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/runes/uruz

### Thurisaz ᚦ (Giant)
Magical Properties: Defense, reactive force
Protective, used to ward off attacks and enforce spiritual boundaries.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/runes/thurisaz

### Ansuz ᚨ (Aesir God)
Magical Properties: Communication, divine message
Associated with wisdom and messages. Used in divination and matters requiring insight.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/runes/ansuz

### Raidho ᚱ (Journey)
Magical Properties: Travel, movement
Used in spells for safe travel, seeing the right path, and personal rhythm.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/runes/raidho

### Kenaz ᚲ (Torch)
Magical Properties: Revelation, knowledge
Lights up the dark, reveals secrets, enhances learning and understanding.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/runes/kenaz

### Gebo ᚷ (Gift)
Magical Properties: Generosity, exchange
Symbolizes gifts and hospitality, represents balance in partnerships.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/runes/gebo

### Wunjo ᚹ (Joy)
Magical Properties: Happiness, well-being, harmony
Used to create happiness and harmony, attracts positive energies.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/runes/wunjo

---

## Popular Crystals

### Amethyst
Properties: Intuition, spiritual growth, calming, protection
Chakras: Third Eye, Crown
Zodiac: Pisces, Aquarius, Virgo
A powerful stone for spiritual protection and purification. Enhances intuition and psychic abilities while providing calm and clarity.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/amethyst

### Rose Quartz
Properties: Unconditional love, self-love, emotional healing
Chakras: Heart
Zodiac: Taurus, Libra
The stone of universal love. Opens the heart to all forms of love and promotes deep inner healing and self-care.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/rose-quartz

### Clear Quartz
Properties: Amplification, clarity, programming, healing
Chakras: All chakras
Zodiac: All signs
The master healer. Amplifies energy and intention, can be programmed for any purpose.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/clear-quartz

### Black Tourmaline
Properties: Protection, grounding, purification
Chakras: Root
Zodiac: Capricorn
A powerful protective stone that creates a shield against negative energies and psychic attack.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/black-tourmaline

### Citrine
Properties: Abundance, manifestation, personal will, creativity
Chakras: Solar Plexus, Sacral
Zodiac: Aries, Gemini, Leo, Libra
The merchant's stone. Attracts wealth, prosperity, and success while promoting joy and positive energy.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/crystals/citrine

---

## Spell Categories

### Protection Spells
Spells and rituals for creating shields, barriers, and safeguards. Protect yourself, your home, and loved ones.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/spells?category=protection

### Love & Relationships
Workings for self-love, attracting love, and strengthening bonds. Ethical love magic focuses on opening yourself to love.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/spells?category=love

### Prosperity & Abundance
Spells for financial success, career advancement, and abundance. Attract opportunities and remove blocks to prosperity.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/spells?category=prosperity

### Healing & Wellness
Rituals for physical, emotional, and spiritual healing. Support (not replace) medical treatment.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/spells?category=healing

### Cleansing & Purification
Spells for removing negative energy, cleansing spaces, and purifying objects. Essential maintenance for magical practice.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/spells?category=cleansing

### Manifestation
Workings for bringing desires into reality. Combine intention, visualization, and energy work.
https://lunary.app/grimoire/spells?category=manifestation

---

## About Lunary

Lunary is a Next.js 15 full-stack astrology and spiritual app built for the 1.2 billion+ people who use astrology, tarot, rituals, moon cycles, crystals, journaling, or symbolic systems to understand their inner world.

Where the market is fragmented, Lunary is unified - bringing together all these practices in one calm, personalized experience.

### Technical Foundation
- Astronomy Engine for NASA-grade planetary calculations
- Real-time moon phase tracking with constellation positions
- Personalized transit calculations based on your birth chart
- AI companion with long-term memory across conversations

### Subscription Tiers
- Free: Limited features, 3 AI messages/day
- Lunary+ ($4.99/mo): Full access, 50 AI messages/day
- Lunary+ AI ($9.99/mo): Premium AI, 300 AI messages/day

### Contact
- Website: https://lunary.app
- Help: https://lunary.app/help
- Discord: https://discord.gg/2WCJncKrKj
